Detailed Description

.NET implementation of the Cover Page service provider interface used by the ciphers.

This implementation connects a .NET Cover Page services object to the C++ by routing the calls from C++ to .NET and then converting the managed memory returned fom .NET into unmanaged C++.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ FileCryptoCoverPageServicesCallback()

IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCryptoCoverPageServicesCallback::FileCryptoCoverPageServicesCallback ( FileCryptoCoverPageServices ^  services)

.NET implementation of the Get Cover Page service function. Connects the C++ version to a .NET sub-class.

Created internally inbetween a .NET Cover Page service subclass and the C++ cipher's that require those services.

Parameters
servicesThe .NET Cover Page services instance

Member Function Documentation

◆ getAccessDeniedPage()

int IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCryptoCoverPageServicesCallback::getAccessDeniedPage ( ISFileCrypto::FileType  fileType,
ISCryptoBytes &  pAccessDeniedPageBytesOut 
)
overridevirtual

.NET implementation of the Get Access Denied Page service function. Connects the C++ version to a .NET sub-class.

Parameters
fileTypeFile type to provide a cover page for (PDF, CSV, etc...)
[out]pAccessDeniedPageBytesOutC++ ISCryptoBytes instance to fill with the unmanaged access denied page data.
Returns
ISFILECRYPTO_OK on success, or ISFILECRYPTO_NO_COVERPAGE on error or unsupported file type.
